content:
Dear all, we recently received approval for a new COST Action (www.cost.eu) on Fintech and Artificial Intelligence, running for the next four years.
We already have about 100 distinguished researchers from across Europe. Should you be interested in joining, please contact me.
Best Joerg

Hi Joerg
Is participation open to organizations from outside Europe? We would like to participate in the COST Action that you referenced, as well as COST in general, however it remains unclear to us as to how we can actually do so.
Thanks
Gregg
